description:
While shopping with Ryo, Kaori meets her friend, Eriko who is a fashion designer. Eriko gives Kaori a makeover and set up a date for her with Ryo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kon`ya dake Kono Ai o... Tokai no Cinderella Story
My Love For Tonight Only Cinderella Story in the City
今夜だけこの愛を... 都会のシンデレラ物語(ストーリー)
